com.fortify.bugtracker.tgt.archer.connection

Class ArcherAuthenticatingRestConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fortify.util.rest.connection.AbstractRestConnection
      • com.fortify.bugtracker.tgt.archer.connection.ArcherBasicRestConnection
        • com.fortify.bugtracker.tgt.archer.connection.ArcherAuthenticatingRestConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRestConnection, AutoCloseable

    public class ArcherAuthenticatingRestConnection
extends ArcherBasicRestConnection
    This class provides a token-authenticated REST connection for Archer.
